personalityTraits.name: Brave
personalityTraits.description: Challenges or danger, X fears nothing.

personalityTraits.name: Craven
personalityTraits.description: X does not enjoy being challenged, or scared, at all.

personalityTraits.name: Calm
personalityTraits.description: X takes things in stride, leading a slow-paced life.

personalityTraits.name: Wrathful
personalityTraits.description: X is quick to anger and fury.

personalityTraits.name: Chaste
personalityTraits.description: X dislikes intimate contact, avoiding the temptations of the flesh.

personalityTraits.name: Lustful
personalityTraits.description: Carnal desires burn hot in X's core.

personalityTraits.name: Content
personalityTraits.description: What they already have, be it much or little, is enough for X.

personalityTraits.name: Ambitious
personalityTraits.description: X knows what they want, and they are not afraid to try and get it.

personalityTraits.name: Diligent
personalityTraits.description: X does not shy away from hard work.

personalityTraits.name: Lazy
personalityTraits.description: The easiest road in life is the road most taken by X.

personalityTraits.name: Fickle
personalityTraits.description: X changes their mind more often than not, making them hard to predict.

personalityTraits.name: Stubborn
personalityTraits.description: X does not back down for anything.

personalityTraits.name: Forgiving
personalityTraits.description: X is quick to move on from most things.

personalityTraits.name: Vengeful
personalityTraits.description: X is slow to forget a slight or someone who does them wrong.

personalityTraits.name: Generous
personalityTraits.description: Acts of benevolence and charity are no strangers to X.

personalityTraits.name: Greedy
personalityTraits.description: X keeps a tight grip on their purse and is always looking for ways to engorge it.

personalityTraits.name: Gregarious
personalityTraits.description: X enjoys spending time with other people.

personalityTraits.name: Shy
personalityTraits.description: X prefers to avoid interacting with other people.

personalityTraits.name: Honest
personalityTraits.description: X values truth and sincerity highly.

personalityTraits.name: Deceitful
personalityTraits.description: To lie and deceive is in X's nature.

personalityTraits.name: Humble
personalityTraits.description: X does not ask for much in life.

personalityTraits.name: Arrogant
personalityTraits.description: X has no problem with their sense of worth.

personalityTraits.name: Just
personalityTraits.description: X has a strong sense of justice.

personalityTraits.name: Arbitrary
personalityTraits.description: X does their own thing and has little regard for others.

personalityTraits.name: Patient
personalityTraits.description: To wait and bide their time is a specialty of X.

personalityTraits.name: Impatient
personalityTraits.description: X thinks that most things should happen fast: ideally they should happen now!

personalityTraits.name: Temperate
personalityTraits.description: According to X, it's best to enjoy things in moderation.

personalityTraits.name: Gluttonous
personalityTraits.description: X scoffs at moderation; they want it all!

personalityTraits.name: Trusting
personalityTraits.description: X is quick to place their faith in others.

personalityTraits.name: Paranoid
personalityTraits.description: X sees enemies in every shadow.

personalityTraits.name: Zealous
personalityTraits.description: Religious conviction burns bright at the center of X.

personalityTraits.name: Cynical
personalityTraits.description: X trusts the self-interest of others above all else.

personalityTraits.name: Compassionate
personalityTraits.description: Both merciful and sympathetic, X is warmhearted.

personalityTraits.name: Callous
personalityTraits.description: Being called both heartless and cold-blooded, X is indifferent to most.

personalityTraits.name: Sadistic
personalityTraits.description: Few things bring X as much joy as the suffering of others.
